attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Norman Osborn would attack, place 1 infamy counter on Criminal Enterprise instead.
name: Norman Osborn
text: Forced Interrupt: When Norman Osborn would take any amount of damage, remove that many infamy counters from Criminal Enterprise instead.

name: Green Goblin
scheme_text: Forced Interrupt: When Green Goblin would scheme, remove 1 madness counter from State of Madness instead.
text: When Revealed: Deal 3 indirect damage to each player in hero form.

attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Norman Osborn would attack, place 2 infamy counter on Criminal Enterprise instead.
name: Norman Osborn
text: Forced Interrupt: When Norman Osborn would take any amount of damage, remove that many infamy counters from Criminal Enterprise instead.

scheme_text: Forced Interrupt: When Green Goblin would scheme, remove 1 madness counter from State of Madness instead.
text: When Revealed: Deal 3 indirect damage to each player.

text: Forced Interrupt: When Norman Osborn would take any amount of damage, remove that many infamy counters from Criminal Enterprise instead.

text: When Revealed: Deal 4 damage to each player.

back_text: Contents: Norman Osborn (I) and Norman Osborn (II). (Norman Osborn (II) and Norman Osborn (III) instead for expert mode.) Risky Business and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Goblin Gimmicks). Setup: Put the Criminal Enterprise environment into play. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advance to stage 1B.
flavor: Norman Osborn holds a board meeting planning to take over a branch of Stark Industries.
name: Hostile Takeover
text: When Completed: Place 1[per_hero] infamy counters on Criminal Enterprise. Then discard 1 card from each player's deck for each infamy counter on Criminal Enterprise.

back_flavor: With a branch of Stark Industries under his control, Norman Osborn will gain access to deadly technologies and quadruple the manufacturing capabilities of Oscorp.
flavor: If Norman Osborn succeeds, nothing will stand in the way of his technological domination.
name: Corporate Acquisition
text: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Criminal Enterprise
text: Criminal Enterprise enter play with 2[per_hero] infamy counters on it. If there are no infamy counters here, flip Norman Osborn and Criminal Enterprise.

flavor: "Fool! Your power is nothing compared to mine! Your strength is nothing, your intellect is NOTHING!" -- Green Goblin
name: State of Madness
text: State of Madness enter play with 2[per_hero] madness counters on it. If there are no madness counters here, flip Green Goblin and State of Madness.

boost_text: Place 1 infamy counter on Criminal Enterprise. If you cannot, remove 1 madness counter from State of Madness.
name: Hired Gun
text: When Revealed: Choose to either give the villain 1 facedown boost card or place 2 infamy counters on Criminal Enterprise.

boost_text: Place 1 infamy counter on Criminal Enterprise. If you cannot, remove 1 madness counter from State of Madness.
name: Private Security Specialist
text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)

boost_text: Place 1 infamy counter on Criminal Enterprise. If you cannot, remove 1 madness counter from State of Madness.
name: Collapsing Bridge

flavor: Despite objections from shareholders, Oscorp now exclusively produces military-grade weaponry.
name: Oscorp Manufacturing
text: When Revealed (Norman Osborn): Place an additional 1[per_hero] threat here.

boost_text: Place 1 infamy counter on Criminal Enterprise. If you cannot, remove 1 madness counter from State of Madness.
name: Payoff

boost_text: Place 1 infamy counter on Criminal Enterprise. If you cannot, remove 1 madness counter from State of Madness.
name: All in a Day's Work
text: When Revealed: Place 2 infamy counters on Criminal Enterprise. If you cannot, remove 2 madness counters from State of Madness.

name: Mad Genius
text: When Revealed (Green Goblin): Green Goblin attacks the hero with the fewest hit points remaining. If no attack was made this way, this card gains surge. When Revealed (Norman Osborn): Discard the top card of your deck for each infamy counter on Criminal Enterprise.

attack_text: Forced Response: After Green Goblin attacks and damages you, place 1 threat on the main scheme.
flavor: "Did you expect the Green Goblin to let you live?!"
name: Green Goblin

attack_text: Forced Response: After Green Goblin attacks and damages you, place 1 threat on the main scheme.
name: Green Goblin
text: When Revealed: Deal 2 encounter cards to each player.

attack_text: Forced Response: After Green Goblin attacks and damages you, place 2 threat on the main scheme.
name: Green Goblin
text: When Revealed: Deal 3 encounter cards to each player.

back_text: Contents: Green Goblin (I) and Green Goblin (II). (Green Goblin (II) and Green Goblin (III) instead for expert mode.) Mutagen Formula and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Goblin Gimmicks). Setup: Put a Goblin Thrall minion into play engaged with each player. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advance to stage 1B.
flavor: Green Goblin has released a toxic mutagen gas on New York City.
name: Unleashing the Mutagen
text: When Completed: In player order, each player not engaged with a [[Goblin]] minion must discard 3 cards from the encounter deck and put the first [[Goblin]] minion they discarded this way into play engaged with them.

back_flavor: As the cloud engulfs the city, those unfortunate enough to be caught in the vapors begin to shiver and shift, mutating into hideous goblin creatures.
flavor: The goblin creatures serve Green Goblin's every command. Stop Green Goblin before his monstrous militia overruns the city!
name: Mutagen Cloud
text: X is equal to the number of [[Goblin]] enemies (including Green Goblin) in play. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Goblin Glider
text: Attach to the enemy with the highest printed hit points and without another Goblin Glider attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Hero Action: Spend [energy] [energy] resources → discard this card.

attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Green Goblin schemes or attacks, give him 1 additional boost card for that activation.
name: Hysteria
scheme_text: Forced Interrupt: When Green Goblin schemes or attacks, give him 1 additional boost card for that activation.
text: Attach to Green Goblin. Hero Action: Spend [mental] [mental] resources → discard this card.

attack_text: Forced Response: After the villain attacks you, discard Pumpkin Bombs and take 2 indirect damage.
name: Pumpkin Bombs
text: Attach to the villain. Hero Action: Spend [physical] [physical] resources → discard this card.

attack_text: Forced Response: After Goblin Knight attacks you, discard 1 card from the encounter deck. If that card is a [[Goblin]] minion, put it into play engaged with you.
boost_text: After this activation ends, shuffle this card into the encounter deck.
name: Goblin Knight

boost_text: Put Goblin Soldier into play engaged with you.
name: Goblin Soldier
text: When Defeated: Deal 1 damage to the engaged player.

boost_text: Put Goblin Thrall into play engaged with you.
name: Goblin Thrall
text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)

boost_text: After this activation ends, shuffle this card into the encounter deck.
name: Monster
text: When Revealed: You are stunned. If you are already stunned, take 2 damage.

flavor: Using the mutagen formula and advanced combat training, Green Goblin has created an elite force of goblin commandos.
name: Goblin Reinforcements
text: When Revealed: Place 1 additional threat here for each [[Goblin]] minion in play.

flavor: "We are not a gang. We are so much more. We're family. An empire! A pantheon! And I? I am the Goblin King!" -- Green Goblin
name: Goblin Nation
text: Each [[Goblin]] enemy (including Green Goblin) gets +1 ATK.

name: Overrun
text: When Defeated: In player order, each player must discard 2 cards from the encounter deck and put each [[Goblin]] minion they discarded this way into play engaged with them.

name: Death from Above
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Green Goblin schemes with +X SCH, where X is equal to the villain's stage number. When Revealed (Hero): Green Goblin attacks with +X ATK, where X is equal to the villain's stage number.

boost_text: This card gets +1 boost icon ([boost]) if at least one [[Goblin]] minion is engaged with you.
name: I See You
text: When Revealed: Green Goblin attack you. If you are in alter-ego form, do not give the villain a boost card for this activation.

name: Overconfidence
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Green Goblin schemes. If at least 3 threat was placed by this activation, this card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Green Goblin attacks you. If at least 3 damage was placed by this activation, this card gains surge.

name: Wicked Ambitions
text: When Revealed: Discard X cards from the encounter deck, where X is equal to double the villain's stage number. Each time a [[Goblin]] minion is discarded this way, choose to either take 3 damage or put that minion into play engaged with you.

name: Goblin Glider
text: Attach to the enemy with the highest printed hit points and without another Goblin Glider attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Hero Action: Spend [energy] [energy] resources → discard this card.

attack_text: Forced Response: After the villain attacks you, discard Pumpkin Bombs and take 2 indirect damage.
name: Pumpkin Bombs
text: Attach to the villain. Hero Action: Spend [physical] [physical] resources → discard this card.

boost_text: Give the villain 1 additional boost card for this activation.
name: Intimidation
text: When Revealed: Choose to either spend 2 resources of any type or give the villain 1 facedown boost card.

name: Regenerative Healing
text: When Revealed: The villain heals X damage, where X is equal to double the villain's stage number. If no damage was healed this way, this card gains surge.

flavor: Scorpion tears through the business district, causing as much mayhem as possible.
name: A Mess of Things
text: When Revealed: Place 2 additional threat here for each stunned friendly character.

attack_text: Forced Response: After Scorpion attacks and damages a character, stun that character.
name: Scorpion
text: Quickstrike. (After this minion engages your hero, it attacks you.)

name: Gang-Up
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): This card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): The villain and each minion engaged with you attacks you.

name: Tail Sweep
text: When Revealed: Scorpion attacks your hero. If no attack was made this way, you are stunned.

name: Power Drain
text: When Defeated: Discard 2 cards from the encounter deck. Each player must choose and discard 1 resource of any type from their hand for each boost icon discarded this way.

attack_text: Forced Response: After Electro attacks you, discard 1 card from the encounter deck. Take 1 indirect damage for each boost icon discarded this way.
boost_text: Discard 3 cards from the encounter deck.
name: Electro

boost_text: Discard 3 cards from the encounter deck.
name: Electromagnetic Pulse
text: When Revealed: Discard 7 cards from the encounter deck. If Electro was discarded this way, put him into play engaged with you. If Electro was not discarded this way, this card gains surge.

boost_text: Discard 3 cards from the encounter deck.
name: Lightning Bolt
text: When Revealed: Discard 2 cards from the encounter deck. Take 1 indirect damage for each boost icon discarded this way.

boost_text: Discard 3 cards from the encounter deck.
name: Shock Therapy
text: When Revealed: Discard 1[per_hero] cards from the encounter deck. The villain heals 1 damage for each boost icon discarded this way.

name: Running Interference
text: When Revealed: Each player must choose to either spend [mental] [physical] resources or place 2 threat here.

attack_text: Forced Response: After Tombstone attacks and damages you, discard a [mental] or [physical] resource from your hand, if able.
name: Tombstone
All Tied Up
text: Attach to your identity card. Attached character cannot ready or change form. Action: Spend [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Media Coverage
text: Attach to your identity card. Resolve each "When Revealed" ability that you reveal 1 additional time. Alter-Ego Action: Spend a [mental] resource → discard this card.
